answers.answer: I have thyroid problems, too and I have to force myself to eat.  If it has been 6 months since last blood test, better get it done again, soon.  Hypothyroid can make you gain weight, be cold, foggy brain and memory.  You probably need an adjustment in meds.  I would do it asap.  Also, have your adrenals checked, too.

Also have them check your A1C (for diabetes) and for antibodies (ANA, RA, etc.)   I have the same symptoms and they can be attributed to my thyroid problem, my diabetes, and my arthritis - all which affect each other.
